title: Lovey Dovey Deep Thing
description: Senior year is just endless drama for Jayden.From Jayden getting irritated with his mom’s scuzzy new boyfriend to the way Gracie flaunts her Christian superiority over Jayden any chance she gets, Jayden always finds life never goes his way. And when new complications come along like his estranged father re-entering the picture, and brings with him a shocking secret, things just get immeasurably worse.But there is a bright spot in Jayden’s life. Or two, rather. Ollie and Geoff.It started as a romance with Ollie but was upended when Geoff entered the picture. Now Jayden is faced with a problem—he likes both boys. A lot. When he’s with one boy, he’s always missing the other, and vice versa.Could he talk both into a poly relationship? Or will he face losing one of them as a potential boyfriend?
author: Kieran Frank
